data.title: Farm Holiday i Denmark
data.meta_description: Vacation in Denmark? Explore the fantastic Farm Holidays at Nymarksminde near Aalborg. Private apartments, access to pool and lots of activities.
data.text:
Welcome to Farm Holiday at Nymarksminde! Here, relaxing coziness is guaranteed during a full week’s vacation on the large farm in beautiful Northern Denmark. It’s delightful family vacation in scenic surroundings with free access to all the traditional farm animals. The animals are a big hit with the children, who love getting up close to them. On the large playground with a bouncy castle and toys, the kids are easily entertained for hours, and indoors, the swimming pool is a major attraction on cloudy days.

You can choose a standard or a large holiday apartment. All apartments have their own kitchen, bathroom, toilet, free Wi-Fi, and free parking.

Additionally, two of the holiday apartments are fully accessible for wheelchair users.

All farm holiday guests at Nymarksminde have free access to all activities in the Mini-zoo, Legeland, Football golf, and Swimmingpool during opening hours. Every day (except Saturday), we organize unique activities for all guests. These include tractor rides, animal feeding, mooncar driving, pancake baking, and much, much more. See the presentation below.

Nymarksminde is close to large forests, beautiful lakes, high hills, and lovely beaches. The farm is only one kilometer from Vodskov – a cozy town with all imaginable facilities; supermarkets, pizzerias, bakeries, and specialty shops – in addition, there are charming farm shops in the area.
